attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Vandalism. The instigators names too be published locally (with photo and facts of incidennt) Ideally, the punishment to be the opposite of the crime.  For example, firstly the offender or social "pest" should be made to wear identifying cloths i.e. "Yellow" for vandals and then be made to work the alloted repairer (non paid of course) as say a labourer on the next 10 Vandalized structures.

Example two. The moronic joyriders,or reckless drivers. Must help firstly in a hospital (cleaning toilets, blood, vomit on shift work mainly the lowest of Tasks.Moreover and most imprtantly general work in the morgue. Preferably, in the presence of road accident victims connected with joyriders etc. I would suggest a black white chequered scull and crossbones motif for their attire. They must also attend funerals and help prepare graves for victims, alongside deprevation of freedom.

Noisy neighbours, next door pest types must suffer sleep deprevation and be subjected to controlled noise infringment and be asked to sign a co-operation form to obey co-living with there neighbours.

etc etc
